text: Melocactus conoideus is a species of plant in the family Cactaceae. It is endemic to Brazil. Its natural habitat is dry savanna. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==Sources== * Taylor, N.P. 2002. Melocactus conoideus. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 22 August 2007. conoideus Category:Endemic flora of Brazil Category:Critically endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Melocactus conoideus
